sentences.en: Bilateral symmetry of denture , masseter muscle, TMJ and jaw movement.

sentences.en: Doctor: I can lessen your inconvenience by making you an immediate denture.
sentences.cn: 医生: 我会为您做一副暂时的假牙来解决这个问题.

sentences.en: He had a denture that he took out at night.
sentences.cn: 他有一副假牙，晚上摘掉不戴。

sentences.en: I can make an immediate denture.
N : For a filling? a denture? or a cleaning?
sentences.cn: 补牙? 镶牙 (做 假牙 ),还是洗牙(洁齿)?

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the failure causes of castingremovable denture with casting prosthesis.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨口腔铸件常见失败原因.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the clinical application and operation of adelomorphic denture.
sentences.cn: 目的:探讨隐形义齿临床的应用和操作.

sentences.en: Objective To increase the retention and stability of traditional removable partial denture.
sentences.cn: 目的:改进常规可摘局部义齿设计的不足,增进固位、稳定.

sentences.en: Patient: I understand. However, I just feel worried about wearing a denture.
sentences.cn: 病人: 好的. 不过, 对戴假牙,我还是很担心.

sentences.en: Results: There are the difference of masticatory efficiency between different denture.
sentences.cn: 结果: 不同修复方法咀嚼效率明显不同.

sentences.en: Take complete denture impression, Customized products of crown . by the factory.
sentences.cn: 取上下全口印模, 由指定厂家定做外部结构.

sentences.en: The cap was made of permanent soft - liner in the denture base.
sentences.cn: 固位帽由永久软衬直接衬于义齿组织面构成.

sentences.en: The position of occlusal reconstruction of full denture.
sentences.cn: 全口义齿重建咬合关系的颌位.

sentences.en: This is a user - friendly guide to the principles of complete denture construction.
sentences.cn: 这是便于用户操作的完全的假牙建设的原则指南.

sentences.en: You need a full upper denture.
sentences.cn: 您需要镶一副上半口假牙.
